pages.text: Welcome to Really Big Medical Center; How can I help you?

pages.fallback: If using a name, be sure to say 'doctor' .
pages.text: You can ask about doctors, numbers, and appointments

pages.text: The medical center includes the oncology, internal medicine, dermatology. The phone is 000 555-3030. It is located at 3033 Elm Blvd., someCity, CA. 99999
